Mount_Vernon.Wakefield\u2013241st Street (IRT White P: Wakefield–241st Street is a terminal station on the IRT White Plains Road Line of the New York City Subway, located at the intersection of 241st Street and White Plains Road in the Wakefield neighborhood of the Bronx. It is served by the 2 train during weekdays and weekday late nights and by the 5 train on weekends and weekend late nights; during weekdays, limited a.m. rush hour 5 service also terminates here in the northbound direction only.
